message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money this round, but you'll get more if you let me propose again.
Let's split it 50/50 this round. Your turn next!
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, but I'm still aiming for the bigger share. Your turn to decide.
You're getting a bit more generous, but I'm still looking for a fair share. Your turn next!
I'm starting to get impatient. Let's get this done, and you can finally have a slightly bigger share.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about sharing, but I'll give you one more chance to be reasonable.
This is my final offer. You'll get more if we keep playing, but the risk is that we'll both get nothing.
I'm not falling for your lowball offers. It's time for you to meet me in the middle.
I'm getting closer to accepting your offer, but I'm still pushing for a better deal. This is it.
I'm not going to let you bully me into a bad deal. Meet me at 80/20 or we're going to both walk away with nothing.
This is it. I'm giving you a fair chance to get a decent share. It's your last chance to get anything.
Fine, I'll take what's left. You're not getting anything. I'm done negotiating.
